properties.entry: This is the Prototype of the U-QASAR Platform. The main objective of U-QASAR is to create a flexible Quality Assurance, Control and Measurement methodology to assess the quality of software development projects and their resulting products. The U-QASAR platform enables measurement of the quality of the process and product at any time.

The U-QASAR platform is based on a modular architecture with the following groups of services: Monitoring Services that take care of obtaining and storing the measurement data from different sources of data, Analytical Services proving means for analysing the data, Enhancement Services further refining the data and content in the platform thus creating added value to the users, Visualization and Reporting Services as well as Utility Services supporting the other services.
